column1: Smoque BBQ////They are well-organized to accommodate a lot of hungry
column3: and there was a line of cars along the side of the store
column4: where people picked up their phone/mobile orders. The staff members  outdoors were ready to deliver the orders to people waiting
column5: requesting their order #. If you do not purchase in advance
column6: you can pull up ahead of the lined cars waiting to collect their orders
column7: and order at the side window where a large menu is on display. We placed our order that moment
column8: and our food was ready in about 12 minutes or so.
